$eref.description: A stringified fraction. For example ``4/7'' or ``-11/3''.
A stringified IEEE-754 value in ``%a'' format. For example, ``sqrt(2)`` is nearest to ``0x1.6a09e667f3bcdp+0''.

description: A generic numerical value container: can be an integer, stringified fraction or stringified IEEE-754 value.

_88fraction.description: A stringified fraction. For example ``4/7'' or ``-11/3''.

_88ieee754.description: A stringified IEEE-754 value in ``%a'' format. For example, ``sqrt(2)`` is nearest to ``0x1.6a09e667f3bcdp+0''.
